mosinstall.name: Manufacturer Module
mosinstall.author: Soeren Eberhardt
mosinstall.description: Shows a List of Manufacturers, so you can browse Products of the chosen Manufacturer.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: text_before
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed at the beginning of the Module

param.name: show_linklist
param.label: Show Link List?
param.description: When enabled, shows a List of Manufacturers with Links to Products of the specific Manufacturers.

param.name: show_dropdown
param.label: Show Drop Down List?
param.description: When enabled, shows a Drop-Down List of Manufacturers which links to Products of the specific Manufacturers.

param.name: auto
param.label: Automatically select Manufacturers?
param.description: This enables the Auto-Select of those Manufacturers that have Products in the actual Category the customer browses in.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
